summary: Most requested admin/customer pages and category editing scaffolding were added (new /orders, /admin/orders, /admin/categories/$categorySlug/edit, multi-image managers). However, the diff indicates the HomePage was changed (violating REQ-1), and the Admin Orders page does not show evidence of required cancel-with-reason and tracking assignment features (REQ-6). Several unrelated features also appear added (e.g., profile-based admin detection, print receipts, new category route).

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the main home page unchanged (no functional or UI changes to the existing homepage route and HomePage component).
missing_requirements.reason: Diff summary explicitly reports HomePage changes, including adding a "new category carousels section" and other layout/content changes, which contradicts the requirement to keep the homepage unchanged.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx describes new category carousels section and other changes)

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin Orders page allows admins to update order status, cancel orders (with reason), and assign tracking information.
missing_requirements.reason: The new AdminOrdersPage shows hooks for fetching orders/products and updating order status, plus filtering UI, but the diff provides no evidence of cancel-with-reason controls/mutations or any tracking information fields/UI. Backend Order type shown also lacks any tracking field.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage.tsx (imports/use: useUpdateOrderStatus; no visible cancel/tracking hooks in truncated excerpt)
backend/main.mo (Order type includes id/customer/productId/quantity/totalPriceInCents/status/upiId/timestamp/cancellable/shippingAddress; no tracking info field)

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage updated with new category carousels section and other behavior/layout changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says to keep homepage unchanged; the diff summary indicates new homepage content/sections were added.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx summary mentions "new category carousels section")

hallucinated_features.description: Automatic admin role detection based on a specific email address in ProfileSetupModal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changing admin determination logic or adding email-based admin auto-detection.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModal.tsx mentions "automatic admin role detection for aureliefinejewellery06@gmail.com")

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requests admin orders management (status/cancel/tracking/filtering) and explicitly excludes export; it does not request printing receipts.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManagement.tsx mentions a "clear print button" for generating order receipts)

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on admin category editing and orders pages; it does not request adding/changing customer-facing category routing.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (comment "New unified category route for /category/<slug>" and route definition)
